project_descr: The IASC (Inter-Agency Standing Committee) Senior Transformative Agenda Implementation Team (STAIT) supports the Transformative Agenda (TA) implementation at country level.

outputs.output_descr: The STAIT strategy addresses remaining gaps in the roll-out of the Transformative Agendam (TA)  and extends STAIT support to TA implementation.
USAID contribution to the 2015 STAIT strategy that addresses remaining gaps in the roll-out of the Transformative Agenda and extends STAIT support to TA implementation.
donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)

document_name: Global Project - STAIT- Signed PAC Minutes

project_title: stait: strengthening effectiveness of humanitarian aid
